subject: [perl #42554] rsync server down?
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Andy Spieherty 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42554]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


I went to check on a follow-up message I received today:

    [perl #39063] [RESOLVED] [TODO] ResizableBooleanArray uses 64 bytes 
    per bit of information

but I can't get at the source via rsync anymore. 

$ rsync -av --delete svn.perl.org::parrot-HEAD parrot
rsync: failed to connect to svn.perl.org: Connection refused (111)
rsync error: error in socket IO (code 10) at clientserver.c(99)

-- 
    Andy Spieherty		spiehera@lafayette.edu
